text: Ne nado toropit'sya, o Mukhammad! Poistine, My skoro i obyazatel'no okazhem tebe podderzhku i daruyem tebe pobedu. My i do tebya posylali poslannikov i, iskhodya iz Svoyey mudrosti, medlili s podderzhkoy, i ikh narod yeshcho bol'she otritsal i oskorblyal ikh. A kogda ikh dushi nakhodilis' v sostoyanii potryaseniya i otchayaniya, k nim obyazatel'no prikhodila Nasha podderzhka, i My spasali veruyushchikh, zasluzhivayushchikh, chtoby My Svoyey voley ikh spasli. A upryamykh mnogobozhnikov My unichtozhali. I nichto ne spasot greshnikov ot nakazaniya
